T02D3130:239a-0: @239a # // 'phags pa dr'a bi da'i bum pa'i cho ga bstan pa /
T02D3130:239a-1: phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa'am //
T02D3130:239a-2: lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stong nags tshal du //
T02D3130:239a-3: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad ;
T02D3130:239a-4: / tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri //
T02D3130:239a-5: phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung //
T02D3130:239a-6: sgo bzhi pa la ku sha'i rtsva yang dgram //
T02D3130:239a-7: bza' dang btung ba sha chang la phug bcas //
T02D3130:239a-8: 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3130:239a-9: bum pa padma dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba //
T02D3130:239a-10: nag po ra ri med pa rin chen bcas //
T02D3130:239a-11: sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba bzhi //
T02D3130:239a-12: ldum bus kha bkang ras kyis mgul ba dkri /
T02D3130:239a-13: raktam ka dang ke li ki li ki li dang
T02D3130:239a-14: // dra bi da la sogs pa brgyar bzlas te //
T02D3130:239a-15: dkyil 'khor khor yug dag par gzhag par bya //
T02D3130:239a-16: de nas byug spos bdug spos la sogs dbul //
T02D3130:239a-17: bgegs kyis brlabs pa shar phyogs kha bstan te //
T02D3130:239a-18: dkyil 'khor dbus su bde ba'i stan la gzhag / bzlas brjod byed cing bum pa re res bkru //
T02D3130:239a-19: 'on kyang log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur //
T02D3130:239a-20: sgrub pa po yi ming ni 'ba' zhig la //
T02D3130:239a-21: bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par ma zad kyi //
T02D3130:239a-22: rgyal po 'khor dang bud med bud med dang //
T02D3130:239a-23: bu mo dang ni rol mo mkhan rnams dang //
T02D3130:239a-24: bud med phal dang tshong pa rnams kyang rung //
T02D3130:239a-25: zhing pa rnams dang dbul zhing phongs pa dang //
T02D3130:239a-26: gdon gyis zin cing rims kyis btab pa dang //
T02D3130:239a-27: byis pa'i gdon dang me tog 'bras bu 'phrog / rmi ngan smyo dang sems ni g-yer ba dang //
T02D3130:239a-28: dug kyang sel te khrus 'dis dag par byed //
T02D3130:239a-29: rgyud las 'byung ba'i bum pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D3130:239a-30: sdig pa zhi bar bya ba'i ched du brjod par bya //
T02D3130:239a-31: lus can rnams la phan phyir bde bar gshegs pa yis //
T02D3130:239a-32: sdig pa dag dang bkra mi shis pa zhi byed pa //
T02D3130:239a-33: khrus bya gtsug lag dag gi rgyud las legs gsungs pa //
T02D3130:239a-34: shin tu bsgrims te nyams su blang bar bya //
T02D3130:239a-35: khrus ni rgyal po rnams kyi gzi byin bskyed pa dang //
T02D3130:239a-36: rgyal srid bsgrubs pas bsod nams che bar byed pa dang //
T02D3130:239b-1: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
T02D3130:239b-2: sdig pa rnams ma lus par zhi bar byed pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-3: bud med bu la gdu ba rnams dang /
T02D3130:239b-4: gang dag rig sngags legs par mi 'grub pa rnams dang /
T02D3130:239b-5: rims nad nyin gcig pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-6: rtag pa'i rims nad zhi bar bya ba la shis pa yin no //
T02D3130:239b-12: skye bo snang ba zhi bar byed pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-13: sgrub pa po bgegs kyis zin pa la shis pa yin no //
T02D3130:239b-14: rgyal po la brten pa'i mi rnams dang /
T02D3130:239b-15: bud med bu 'dod pa rnams dang /
T02D3130:239b-16: bud med khyim thab mi 'dod pa de dag dang /
T02D3130:239b-25: sems khong du chud pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-27: gdon thams cad kyis zin pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-28: thog mar sngags pas gser ram /
T02D3130:239b-31: kham pa las bum pa mnyam zhing legs par bya ba dang /
T02D3130:239b-32: ma chag ma zhom pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-34: dbyibs legs shing shin tu mdzes pa bzhi nan tan bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-35: dbul po rnams kyis ni gser dang dngul dang zangs las byas pa'i bum pa mi rnyed pas /
T02D3130:239b-36: de'i phyir kham pa las byas pa'i bum pa shin tu mtshan dang ldan zhing spa ba /
T02D3130:239b-37: padma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byi ru dang li khri dang /
T02D3130:239b-38: mtshal gyi mdog 'dra ba bzhi bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-39: bum pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi gdub kor ni 'phangs
T02D3130:239b-40: su sor gcig gi tshad du byas te gdags so
T02D3130:239b-41: // dbus kyi dbyibs ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-42: mgrin pa ni 'phongs su sor bzhi pa ste /
T02D3130:239b-43: mgrin pa'i steng kha'i phyi rol gyi kha khyer 'dab ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du mnyam par bya /
T02D3130:239b-44: kha ni sor bzhi'i tshad du mnyam par bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-45: bum pa mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa yang chag cing zhom pa dang /
T02D3130:239b-47: thag thug can rnams ni spang bar bya'o //
T02D3130:239b-48: mtshan nyid rdzogs pa ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis par gsungs so //
T02D3130:240a-1: par bum pa 'ba' zhig gis 'dod pa'i las myur du 'grub bar mi 'gyur bas /
T02D3130:240a-2: de'i phyir thog mar dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol du brtag par bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-8: nags tshal du yang rung ste /
T02D3130:240a-9: gnas de dag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-10: sa gzhi rab tu brtags te shin tu dag par byas la thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D3130:240a-11: gru bzhi'i tshad kyi gru bzhi par byas la phur bus nges par gdab par bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-12: de'i dbus su sngags shes pas khrus bya ba'i sa khru do gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-13: dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa sgo bzhi pa
T02D3130:240a-14: bkra shis kyi sgo bzhi sa mdzes par byas pa
T02D3130:240a-15: bri bar bya'o // phyi rol thog thag tu yang rtsva ku shas 'khor bar dgram mo //
T02D3130:240a-16: steng du ni bla re legs par dgram zhing me tog gi phrang ba dang /
T02D3130:240a-19: me long dag gis legs par nan tan du brgyan na /
T02D3130:240a-20: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis so //
T02D3130:240a-21: de nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs te /
T02D3130:240a-22: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis btab nas des sgo logs nas brtsams te bskor bar bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-23: de nas tshon rtsi lnga ste /
T02D3130:240a-28: nag po'i phye ma rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rnams bris la /
T02D3130:240a-29: bris pa de'i nang rim du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas /
T02D3130:240a-30: dra bi da la sogs pa'i phyag rgya go rims bzhin bri bar bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-31: dra bi da'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D3130:240a-32: gtum mo chen mo'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D3130:240a-33: stobs po che'i nas 'bras kyi dbyibs su gsungs so //
T02D3130:240a-34: dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje rtse gsum par bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-35: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje rgya gram la ra phyogs gcig med par gsungs so //
T02D3130:240a-36: rdo rje yangs pa'i ni rdo rje rgya gram mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D3130:240a-37: byis pa k'i li k'i li'i ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D3130:240a-38: snying po mchog gi ni rdo rje rtse gsum par bya'o //
T02D3130:240a-39: phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang /
T02D3130:240a-40: khri'u'i steng na gnas par bya'o //
T02D3130:240b-0: dra bi da la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams legs par bris nas @240b langs te /
T02D3130:240b-1: de'i phyi rol du byung la dkyil 'khor phyi rol du phyogs kyi lha rnams dgod par bya ste /
T02D3130:240b-2: shar phyogs su dbang po'i rdo rje bri'o //
T02D3130:240b-3: me'i mtshams su ni me'i thab khung bri'o //
T02D3130:240b-4: lho'i phyogs su ni gshin rje be con no //
T02D3130:240b-5: bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral gyi ral gri'o //
T02D3130:240b-6: nub phyogs su ni chu lha'i zhags pa'o //
T02D3130:240b-7: rlung gi phyogs ni rlung gi ba dan no //
T02D3130:240b-8: byang phyogs su ni ku be ra'i dbyug to'o //
T02D3130:240b-9: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni dbang phyug chen po'i mdud rtse gsum pa bri'o //
T02D3130:240b-10: zla ba ni shar phyogs su bri ste dkar por bya'o //
T02D3130:240b-11: nyi ma ni nub phyogs su bri ste shin tu dmar por bya'o //
T02D3130:240b-12: sa'i lha'i phyag rgya bum pa ste zhags pa'i gong du bri'o //
T02D3130:240b-13: phyogs kyi lha 'de dag kyang rang rang gi tshogs dang bcas pa mchod pa bya ste /
T02D3130:240b-14: brgya byin gyi 'khor ni lha rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-15: me'i 'khor ni drang srong rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-16: gshin rje'i 'khor ni ma mo rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-17: bden bral gyi 'khor ni srin po rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-18: chu lha'i 'khor ni klu rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-19: rlung lha'i 'khor ni rig sngags 'chang rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-20: rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor ni gnod sbyin rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-21: dbang ldan gyi 'khor ni 'byung po rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-22: sa'i lha mo'i 'khor rnams ni sa bdag rnams so //
T02D3130:240b-23: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang rang rang gi lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa mchod par bya'o //
T02D3130:240b-24: de ltar phyi rol gyi 'khor du phyogs kyi lha dgod pa'i go rims ni bstan zin to //
T02D3130:240b-25: dkyil 'khor bris zin nas bum pa cho ga bzhin du dag par byas te /
T02D3130:240b-26: chu la sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa bsangs la lag pa dri yis bskus pas blangs te /
T02D3130:240b-27: bum pa'i ngos rnams su kakko la dang /
T02D3130:240b-28: tsandan dkar po la sogs pa shin tu dri zhim
T02D3130:240b-29: po bkra shis pa gang yang rung ba dag gis
T02D3130:240b-30: rdo rje la sogs pa phyag rgya'i ri mo rnams
T02D3130:240b-32: de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags /
T02D3130:240b-33: aom aa mri te h'um phat ces bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas gu gul btab ste /
T02D3130:240b-34: des bum pa bdugs nas chu mig gam /
T02D3130:240b-36: chu klung bkra shis pa gang yang rung ba'i chu
T02D3130:240b-37: gtsang ma blangs nas srog chags med pa legs apar
T02D3130:240b-38: btsags pa des bkang ba'i bum pa'i nang du rin
T02D3130:241a-4: gser te rin po che de lta bu dag dang /
T02D3130:241a-10: ha sa de ba 'di rnams dang /
T02D3130:241a-23: dri dang ldan pa 'di rnams kyang gzhag go //
T02D3130:241a-24: bum pa'i mgul pa la yang tshon sna lnga pa'i
T02D3130:241a-25: skud pa la yang bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis btab
T02D3130:241a-26: pas bcings la / dar ram ras dkar po sar pas yang bcings te /
T02D3130:241a-27: bum pa'i kha shing aa mra'i rigs ha sa ka ra zhes bya ba yal ga dang /
T02D3130:241a-30: yang na zhim po 'khri shing dang yal gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang gzhug go //
T02D3130:241a-31: bum pa legs par bkang nas de'i 'og tu legs par khrus bya'o //
T02D3130:241a-32: khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te thogs nas
T02D3130:241a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi sar song nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub
T02D3130:241a-35: de'i sngags kyis 'bar ba'i mig gis shar phyogs su
T02D3130:241a-36: bltas la bgegs bsal ba'i sngags k'i li k'i li
T02D3130:241a-37: se gol dang ldan par brjod do ;
T02D3130:241a-38: / yungs kar gyis kyang bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02D3130:241a-39: bgegs thams cad bsal nas dra ba dang rab phur bu bya ste /
T02D3130:241a-40: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
T02D3130:241a-41: sarba ta th'a ga te bhi kam pa badzra k'i
T02D3130:241a-42: li k'i la ya aa ka ra aa sv'a h'a
T02D3130:241a-43: / rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so //
T02D3130:241a-44: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
T02D3130:241a-46: sarba th'a badzra pra k'a ra /
T02D3130:241a-47: sarba ta th'a ga ta garbha tsa na ka //
T02D3130:241a-48: ku ru ku ru tsakra n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:241a-49: rdo rje ra ba'i sngags so //
T02D3130:241a-50: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
T02D3130:241a-52: sarba th'a badzra ra panytsa ra ni kshi pa ga ga na ka sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:241a-53: rdo rje ra ba'i sngags so //
T02D3130:241a-54: cho ga lhag chad du gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D3130:241a-55: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg legs par byas nas dbang ldan
T02D3130:241a-56: gyi phyogs la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs dang
T02D3130:241a-57: phyogs mtshams rnams su dra bi da la sogs pa
T02D3130:241a-58: lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshig
T02D3130:241a-60: de la lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs te
T02D3130:241b-0: mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis @241b ral gri ltar
T02D3130:241b-1: bsgreng ba 'di ni dri bi da'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3130:241b-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3130:241b-4: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D3130:241b-5: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D3130:241b-6: aom dra bi da pa ra h'um phat /
T02D3130:241b-7: lag pa g-yon mdzub mo gnyis ka logs su gzhug
T02D3130:241b-8: la lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum par
T02D3130:241b-9: byas pa 'di ni gtum po chen po'i phyag rgya'o
T02D3130:241b-11: aom ma h'a tsanda h'um phat /
T02D3130:241b-12: gong ma bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig dang yang ldan par bya'o //
T02D3130:241b-13: lag pa gnyis snyim pa khong stong du sbyar ba 'di ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D3130:241b-15: aom ma h'a ba la h'um phat /
T02D3130:241b-16: snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rgyab tu srin lag gnyis sbyar te /
T02D3130:241b-17: gung mo gnyis yang de bzhin du de'i rgyab tu
T02D3130:241b-18: sbyar nas nang du bkug la mdzub mo gnyis rtse
T02D3130:241b-19: sprad de mthe bo gnyis sa so'i ngos la gzhar
T02D3130:241b-20: ba 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya
T02D3130:241b-22: aom aa pa r'a dzi te h'um phat /
T02D3130:241b-23: lag pa gnyis snying gar byas la srin lag gnyis
T02D3130:241b-24: nang du bkug ste phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo
T02D3130:241b-25: mthe bo dang / mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'dud par byas la /
T02D3130:241b-26: gung mo gnyis gshibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo
T02D3130:241b-27: gnyis bkug pa nas gang gis ma reg par bya
T02D3130:241b-29: mthe chung gnyis kyang gshibs pa 'di ni /
T02D3130:241b-30: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya la thams cad byed pa yin te /
T02D3130:241b-32: aom badzra dzva la n'i ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:241b-33: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo
T02D3130:241b-34: gnyis phye ste bkug nas nas tsam gyis ma reg
T02D3130:241b-35: par bya ste / mthe bo gnyis par du gshibs pa ni rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D3130:241b-37: aom ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D3130:241b-38: snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bsnol
T02D3130:241b-39: te bzhag pa'i bar du mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab
T02D3130:241b-40: la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo'i tshigs dbu ma
T02D3130:241b-41: la gzugs / srin lag gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i
T02D3130:241b-42: tshigs dang por gung mo gnyis bkug pa'i rtse mos
T02D3130:241b-43: btsugs pa ni k'i li k'i li'i phyag rgya ste
T02D3130:241b-45: aom k'i li k'i li ba la k'i li ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:241b-46: lag pa gnyis sor mo'i nang du bsnol te khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo dang /
T02D3130:242a-0: gung mo dang mthe'u chung rnams so sor gshibs te @242a * //
T02D3130:242a-1: bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D3130:242a-3: aom badzra dhri ka 'di la re re nas lag
T02D3130:242a-4: pa'i phyag rgya sngar bcings la ae hye hi zhes
T02D3130:242a-5: bya ba ste / re re la yang bskul ba'i
T02D3130:242a-6: sngags dang sbyar la mchod yon la sngags lan bdun
T02D3130:242a-7: nam nyi shu rtsa gcig btab la dbul lo ;
T02D3130:242a-8: / de nas dbang po la sogs pa rnams so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ba dang /
T02D3130:242a-10: mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3130:242a-11: shar phyogs su kha bltas te rkang pa g-yas brkyang
T02D3130:242a-12: ba'i tshul gyis lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag
T02D3130:242a-13: rgya bstan la / lag pa g-yas pa'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su gzhag par bya /
T02D3130:242a-15: aom ha na ha na bhindha badzra h'um phat /
T02D3130:242a-16: rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul kyis lag pa
T02D3130:242a-17: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bskyod de g-yas
T02D3130:242a-18: pas ni brgya byin spyan drang ngo //
T02D3130:242a-19: lag pa gnyis brkyang la phyag rgya bkrol la slar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242a-20: me'i phyogs su bltas te lag pa brkyang la mdzub
T02D3130:242a-21: mo bkug ste rtse mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum bar
T02D3130:242a-23: aom badzra na ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la ya
T02D3130:242a-24: sarba ma h'a bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'am h'um phat
T02D3130:242a-25: / mthe bo lag mthil du sbyar te brtan por bzhag la g-yabs pas ni spyan drang ngo //
T02D3130:242a-26: mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs la phyir drag tu brkyang bas ni slar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242a-27: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas te 'greng la snyim pa mdun du gzhag ste /
T02D3130:242a-28: sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur dam du
T02D3130:242a-29: bcangs te srin lag gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs nas snying
T02D3130:242a-31: aom badzra k'a la danda ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D3130:242a-32: srin lag gshibs pa las nang du bzlog pas ni spyan drang ba'o //
T02D3130:242a-33: nang du bzlog pa las phyir phyung ba gshibs pas nis lar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242a-34: bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par bzhag la /
T02D3130:242a-35: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshu ra bcangs pa la
T02D3130:242a-36: mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis ral gri 'dra bar
T02D3130:242a-38: lag pa g-yon pa yang de'i tshul gyis zhags pa
T02D3130:242a-39: 'dra bar byas te sta zur logs su gzhag par
T02D3130:242a-41: aom nee ri te r'aksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:242b-0: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste @242b g-yabs bas spyan drang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-1: phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-2: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par bzhag la /
T02D3130:242b-3: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas /
T02D3130:242b-4: mthe bo dang mdzub mo zhags mig ltar bya /
T02D3130:242b-5: g-yon pa la yang de ltar byas te /
T02D3130:242b-8: aom n'a ga badzra a'a na ya sarba dha na da n+ya ni dya n+ya su barna ma ni /
T02D3130:242b-11: badzra dha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ya /
T02D3130:242b-15: pradzny'a n'am ma h'a tse da h'um phat /
T02D3130:242b-16: g-yon ba'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yabs pas ni spyan drangs pa'o //
T02D3130:242b-17: phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-18: rlung lha'i phyogs su 'greng la lag pa g-yon pa
T02D3130:242b-19: khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang
T02D3130:242b-20: por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor tho btsugs la /
T02D3130:242b-21: lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te /
T02D3130:242b-22: sta zur logs su gzhag go //
T02D3130:242b-23: sngags la aom badzra aa n'i la ma h'a dhe
T02D3130:242b-24: ga aa n'i la ma h'a dhe ga a'a na
T02D3130:242b-26: mdzub mo de nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang slar gtang bar bya'o //
T02D3130:242b-27: ku be ra'i phyogs su rdo rje bcings pa nang
T02D3130:242b-28: du bzlog nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba'i
T02D3130:242b-29: rgyab tu so so'i srin lag gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3130:242b-31: aom ku be ra yaksham aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:242b-32: gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug pa ste g-yabs pas spyan drang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-33: de phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar gtang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-34: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su kha bltas te 'grong la
T02D3130:242b-35: snyim pa bkan nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang
T02D3130:242b-37: gung mog nyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su rdo rje ltar bya /
T02D3130:242b-38: mthe bo gnyis bar du gshibs te gzhag go //
T02D3130:242b-40: aom dri h'um bi la badzra sh'u la sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:242b-41: mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo sprad pa las nang du g-yabs bas ni spyan drang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-42: phyir bkyed de bkrol bas ni slar btang ngo //
T02D3130:242b-43: 'og gi ni lag ba gnyis padma ltar byas la
T02D3130:242b-44: spyan drang ba dang slar gtang bar bya ba la
T02D3130:242b-45: yang nang du g-yabs pa dang phyir bkrol bar bya'o
T02D3130:242b-47: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D3130:242b-48: aom dra bi ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:242b-49: steng gi ni gra ha shva rya pra ba ta dzyi ti ra ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3130:243a-2: sngags 'di dag kyang bshad zin to //
T02D3130:243a-3: de nas yang mchod yon phul nas dra bi da la sogs pa legs par mchod de /
T02D3130:243a-4: me tog chu las skyes pa dang /
T02D3130:243a-6: bdug pa srog chags kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i dri yid du 'ong ba dag dang /
T02D3130:243a-11: gur gum la sogs pa'i dri bsrung can dang /
T02D3130:243a-13: 'bras chan zho dang sbyar bas mchod nas /
T02D3130:243a-14: dbang po la sogs pa rnams la sha chang ma yin pa dang /
T02D3130:243a-15: sha chang de dang sbyar ba ma yin pa'i bshos cha mang po dbul lo //
T02D3130:243a-16: de dag gi 'khor gyi gdon rnams la ni sha chang dang ldan par sbyin no //
T02D3130:243a-17: de ltar sha dang chang rtsa ba dang /
T02D3130:243a-19: bgegs kyi kha zas ci yang rung ba byin na
T02D3130:243a-20: phyi rol gyi 'khor ba bgegs kyi gzugs can gang
T02D3130:243a-21: yin pa de dag des dga' par 'gyur ro //
T02D3130:243a-22: phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D3130:243a-23: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D3130:243a-24: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3130:243a-25: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-26: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
T02D3130:243a-27: me lha'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag //
T02D3130:243a-28: phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3130:243a-29: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-30: gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D3130:243a-31: ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3130:243a-32: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-33: bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
T02D3130:243a-34: srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / lho nub gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3130:243a-35: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-36: zhags pa tshogs pa chu yi lha //
T02D3130:243a-37: bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02D3130:243a-38: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-39: rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02D3130:243a-40: tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02D3130:243a-41: rlung gi phyogs kyi gdon bcas la //
T02D3130:243a-42: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243a-43: gnod sbyin lag na dbyug to thogs //
T02D3130:243b-0: @243b nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02D3130:243b-1: byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02D3130:243b-2: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243b-3: dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
T02D3130:243b-4: bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / byang shar gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02D3130:243b-5: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243b-6: 'og gi sa yi lha mo ba //
T02D3130:243b-7: klu mo chen mo zhi ba ste //
T02D3130:243b-8: sa bdag 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i mchog / sa yi lha mo 'khor bcas la //
T02D3130:243b-9: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243b-10: steng gi lha chen thams cad dang //
T02D3130:243b-11: nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang //
T02D3130:243b-12: gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la //
T02D3130:243b-13: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3130:243b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la bum pa rnams phyogs bzhir bzhag nas /
T02D3130:243b-15: de na 'dug bzhin du sngags dang ldan par phyag brgya bcings la /
T02D3130:243b-16: bum pa rnams kyi nang du lha rnams bkod nas
T02D3130:243b-17: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan rangs pas
T02D3130:243b-18: bzlas brjod bya'o ; / yang na snying po brgyad
T02D3130:243b-19: po re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
T02D3130:243b-20: bzlas brjod bya'o ; / rtsa ba'i sa bon dang /
T02D3130:243b-24: me tog gi sa bon dang /
T02D3130:243b-25: ge sar gyi sa bon dang /
T02D3130:243b-27: sa bon sna bdun gyi phye ma zhi ba mo til mar gyis sbyar te /
T02D3130:243b-28: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis legs par btab la /
T02D3130:243b-29: de nas khrus byed pa la logs shig tu lus bkrus shing dril te /
T02D3130:243b-30: khrus byas la gos gtsang mgon te dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3130:243b-31: sgor bkug nas de la bsrung ba chen po bya'o
T02D3130:243b-32: // de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la
T02D3130:243b-33: sogs pa byin te dkyil 'khor du de bcug la
T02D3130:243b-34: // / gus bas phyag byas nas cho ga bzhin
T02D3130:243b-35: du nang du zhugs te 'dug pa'i 'og tu sngags
T02D3130:243b-36: bzlas shing bum pa re re nas legs par khrus
T02D3130:243b-42: rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig dang /
T02D3130:243b-43: rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang ldan par bya'o //
T02D3130:244a-0: gi wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u tshang bting ba'i steng @244a * //
T02D3130:244a-2: slob ma de bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag la /
T02D3130:244a-3: de las yungs kar la sogs pa blangs shing de la sbyin no //
T02D3130:244a-4: de nas yang bsrung ba byas la rdo rje phyed
T02D3130:244a-5: de'i lag tu byin te zhi ba dang dga' ba'i
T02D3130:244a-6: sems dang ldan pas longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig
T02D3130:244a-8: rdo rje phyed po de la 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad las thar nas ldang bar byed de /
T02D3130:244a-9: zla ba sgra gcan gyis btang ba bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral zhing mdzes so //
T02D3130:244a-10: de nas yang 'byor na mar la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D3130:244a-11: bla ma'i yon yang khrus byed pa des shin tu bzang po legs par dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3130:244a-12: de nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gshegs su gsol lo //
